body_html:
We only officially support the following:
Operating systems: Ubuntu Linux 14 LTE to 16. Mac OS X El Capitan. CentOS 7 and above
CUDA: 7.0 - 7.5 (soon 8.0)

From the error messages like
ln: failed to create symbolic link 'util/python/python_lib' -> '': No such file or directory
it looks like python_config.sh doesn't understand your system.

This is possibly related to #3933 ?

This is possibly related to #3933 ?
body:
We only officially support the following:
Operating systems: Ubuntu Linux 14 LTE to 16. Mac OS X El Capitan. CentOS 7 and above
CUDA: 7.0 - 7.5  (soon 8.0)

From the error messages like
`ln: failed to create symbolic link 'util/python/python_lib' -> '': No such file or directory`
it looks like python_config.sh doesn't understand your system.

This is possibly related to #3933 ?
